objects.specification: The fair booth floor is constructed from durable, non-reflective material with a subtle matte finish in a neutral tone, providing a stable anti-slip surface that complements the overall booth design and accommodates the weight and movement around the demonstration car.

Tall enclosure walls featuring a clean, neutral light grey surface with a smooth matte texture. The panels rise to a height ideal for branding graphics and suspend lighting fixtures, forming a cohesive backdrop for the booth perimeter.

Tall enclosure walls featuring a clean, neutral light grey surface with a smooth matte texture. The panels rise to a height ideal for branding graphics and suspend lighting fixtures, forming a cohesive backdrop for the booth perimeter.

Tall enclosure walls featuring a clean, neutral light grey surface with a smooth matte texture. The panels rise to a height ideal for branding graphics and suspend lighting fixtures, forming a cohesive backdrop for the booth perimeter.

Tall enclosure walls featuring a clean, neutral light grey surface with a smooth matte texture. The panels rise to a height ideal for branding graphics and suspend lighting fixtures, forming a cohesive backdrop for the booth perimeter.

A realistic life-size demonstration car with sleek aerodynamic bodywork finished in high-gloss metallic paint. It features showroom-quality details including polished alloy wheels, tinted windows, and visible panel lines, oriented to face visitors as they enter the booth.

A modern reception desk with a minimalist design combining smooth surfaces and subtle contrasting accents. The desk has a spacious countertop for two staff members, integrated storage behind the facade, and a complementary color scheme that invites visitors.

A tall information stand with a bright golden frame, featuring an angled display surface for brochures and interactive digital screen placement. The stand has a sturdy tubular support and an accent LED edge light to highlight product details.

A tall information stand with a bright golden frame, featuring an angled display surface for brochures and interactive digital screen placement. The stand has a sturdy tubular support and an accent LED edge light to highlight product details.

A tall information stand with a bright golden frame, featuring an angled display surface for brochures and interactive digital screen placement. The stand has a sturdy tubular support and an accent LED edge light to highlight product details.

A simple yet comfortable visitor chair with a modern silhouette, padded seat and backrest upholstered in neutral fabric. The chair stands on slender metal legs and is oriented to face the reception desk for easy conversation.

A simple yet comfortable visitor chair with a modern silhouette, padded seat and backrest upholstered in neutral fabric. The chair stands on slender metal legs and is oriented to face the reception desk for easy conversation.

An overhead signboard bearing the brand logo and booth name in bold typography, housed within a slim frame and backlit by integrated LED panels. The sign features a clean white background with contrasting brand colors and is suspended above the entrance.

A compact adjustable spotlight fixture with a cylindrical head and concealed mounting bracket. The fixture casts a focused warm white beam to accentuate the demonstration car and surrounding areas, and its matte finish blends with the ceiling hardware.

A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage, placed in a modern cylindrical planter. The plant adds a natural touch to the booth corners, complementing the neutral palette and softening the overall environment.
